notes: Reproduced: the netcoreapp3.1 directory in SkiaSharp.Views.Forms 2.88.0-preview.179 contains only 0-byte _._placeholder files, not DLL assemblies, confirming the reporter's observation that it appears empty. However, this is standard NuGet packaging convention — _._placeholders declare TFM compatibility while the netstandard2.0 assembly provides runtime support. The .targets file in build/netcoreapp3.1/ handles WPF build integration. This pattern is identical across all 2.88.x versions (preview.127 through stable 2.88.9). The package was removed entirely in SkiaSharp 3.x. Both netcoreapp3.1 and Xamarin.Forms are EOL.

reproductionSteps.description: Download SkiaSharp.Views.Forms 2.88.0-preview.179 NuGet package for inspection
Inspect netcoreapp3.1 directory contents in the reporter's NuGet package to verify the reported empty directory
Run programmatic inspection of all three package versions (preview.127, preview.179, stable 2.88.9) to verify the pattern is consistent
reproductionSteps.output:
=== 2.88.0-preview.179 (reporter) ===
  netcoreapp3.1 entries: 3
    build/netcoreapp3.1/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.targets (2078 bytes)
    lib/netcoreapp3.1/_._ (0 bytes)
    ref/netcoreapp3.1/_._ (0 bytes)
  DLLs: 0, Placeholders (_._): 2
  RESULT: Directory contains only _._placeholder files (NO DLLs)

=== 2.88.0-preview.127 (first netcoreapp3.1) ===
  netcoreapp3.1 entries: 3
  DLLs: 0, Placeholders (_._): 2
  RESULT: Directory contains only _._placeholder files (NO DLLs)

=== 2.88.9 (latest stable 2.88.x) ===
  netcoreapp3.1 entries: 3
  DLLs: 0, Placeholders (_._): 2
  RESULT: Directory contains only _._placeholder files (NO DLLs)

=== Checking netstandard2.0 fallback (preview.179) ===
  ref/netstandard1.3/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.dll (34224 bytes)
  ref/netstandard2.0/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.dll (34224 bytes)

filesCreated.description: Console app that inspects NuGet package ZIP contents for netcoreapp3.1 entries across multiple versions
Project file for the nupkg inspection tool

reproductionSteps.description: Verify SkiaSharp.Views.Forms does not exist in SkiaSharp 3.x (package was removed entirely)
reproductionSteps.command: curl -s https://api.nuget.org/v3-flatcontainer/skiasharp.views.forms/index.json | python3 -c "import sys,json; v=json.load(sys.stdin)['versions']; print('Latest:', v[-1]); print('Any 3.x:', any(x.startswith('3.') for x in v))"

reproductionSteps.description: Verify SkiaSharp.Views.Forms nuspec does not exist on main branch (SkiaSharp 3.x removed it)
reproductionSteps.command: ls -d nuget/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms* 2>/dev/null || echo 'No Views.Forms nuspec on main'

versionResults.notes: Reporter's version. lib/netcoreapp3.1/ and ref/netcoreapp3.1/ contain only 0-byte _._placeholders. No DLL assemblies present.
Version where netcoreapp3.1 support was first added. Same _._placeholder pattern — this was always by design.
Latest stable in 2.88.x line. Same _._placeholder pattern persists through all stable releases.

SkiaSharp.Views.Forms was removed entirely in SkiaSharp 3.x (PR #2505). The nuspec no longer exists on main. The package is obsolete — both netcoreapp3.1 (EOL Dec 2022) and Xamarin.Forms (superseded by MAUI) are discontinued.

errorMessages.primaryError: netcoreapp3.1 lib/ and ref/ directories contain only 0-byte _._placeholder files — no actual DLL assemblies present

triageCorrections.corrected: Confirmed the reporter's observation is factually accurate — the netcoreapp3.1 directory contains only _._placeholder files, not DLLs. The behavior reproduces, though it is working-as-designed NuGet packaging convention.
